item.title: 就业数据疲软令收益率承压，科技股受助，美股攀升
item.description: 由于数据显示劳动力市场疲软，支持降息，美国股市周四开盘小幅飘绿。科技股攀升，即使在一连串令人失望的财报之后，10 年期国债收益率跌至 5 月初以来的最低点。【原文：US stocks opened slightly in the green on Thursday as data signaled a softening labor market, supporting interest-rate cuts. Tech stocks climbed, even after a string of disappointing earnings, with yields on 10-year Treasuries falling to the lowest since early May.】

item.title: 就业数据支持降息，国债收益率为数月最低
item.description: 由于劳动力市场降温的更多证据增强了对美联储本月开始降息的预期，几种基准国债收益率降至几个月来的最低水平。【原文：Several benchmark Treasury yields declined to the lowest levels in several months as additional evidence of labor-market cooling bolstered expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts beginning this month.】

item.title: 奥尔斯泰德起诉美国，希望挽救被特朗普阻止的风力发电厂
item.description: 陷入困境的 Orsted A/S公司起诉特朗普政府，试图恢复其几乎完工的新英格兰近海风电场的建设，但遭到了政府的阻挠。【原文：Embattled Orsted A/S sued the Trump administration in an effort to revive construction of its almost-finished offshore New England wind farm that the government blocked, kicking off what may become a major legal battle over recent policies targeting the industry.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯沙特沙比克公司据称将放缓工业气体部门的首次公开募股工作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特基础工业公司（Saudi Basic Industries Corp.【原文：Saudi Basic Industries Corp. is slowing work on a potential initial public offering of its industrial gases business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国首次申请失业救济人数升至 6 月以来最高水平
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数升至 6 月份以来的最高点，进一步证明劳动力市场正在降温。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits rose to the highest since June, adding to evidence that the labor market is cooling.】

item.title: 美国贸易逆差扩大至四个月来最大 进口激增
item.description: 美国贸易赤字在 7 月份扩大至四个月来的新高，原因是在唐纳德-特朗普总统对全球贸易伙伴征收新关税之前，企业竞相进口商品和材料。【原文：The US trade deficit widened in July to a four-month high as companies raced to import goods and materials before President Donald Trump unveiled new tariffs on global trading partners.】

item.title: 出口增长缓慢，加拿大货物贸易逆差缩小
item.description: 加拿大商品贸易逆差的收窄幅度超过预期，因为该国的出口显示出从美国关税冲击中缓慢反弹的迹象。【原文：Canada’s merchandise trade deficit narrowed by more than expected as the country’s exports show signs of a slow rebound from the shock of US tariffs.】

item.title: 据说中东天然气公司准备聘请罗斯柴尔德集团探讨 IPO 事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中东特种气体制造商 Gulf Cryo 准备聘请 Rothschild & Co.【原文：Middle Eastern specialty gas manufacturer Gulf Cryo is poised to hire Rothschild & Co. to explore options including an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示美国企业新增就业岗位 5.4 万个，低于预期
item.description: 8 月份美国公司的招聘人数少于预期，这与其他表明工人需求疲软的证据一致。【原文：Hiring at US companies was less than forecast in August, consistent with other evidence that points to weaker demand for workers.】

item.title: Roblox 因儿童安全问题在阿联酋和沙特阿拉伯限制功能
item.description: 随着阿拉伯联合酋长国和沙特阿拉伯儿童安全问题和监管审查的加强，Roblox 公司将限制其热门视频游戏平台的某些功能。【原文：Roblox Corp. will restrict certain features on its popular video-game platform in the United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia as child safety concerns and regulatory scrutiny intensify in the region.】

item.title: 对冲基金 AQR 失去 47 亿美元荷兰养老基金委托权
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）是失去 PFZW 委托的公司之一，因为荷兰养老基金担心外部管理公司没有充分关注可持续发展，因此削减了一些外部管理公司。【原文：AQR Capital Management is among firms to have lost its mandate with PFZW, as the Dutch pension fund cuts a number of external managers due to concerns that they’re not adequately focused on sustainability.】

item.title: 匈牙利总统瓦尔加：稳定福林促进增长、抗击通胀
item.description: 匈牙利央行行长米哈里-瓦尔加（Mihaly Varga）说，货币稳定是减缓通货膨胀和为更强劲的经济增长奠定基础的关键。【原文：Hungarian central bank governor Mihaly Varga said currency stability is key for slowing inflation and laying the groundwork for more robust economic growth.】

item.title: 已关闭的核电厂是该行业即将迎来发展的最佳赌注
item.description:
重新启动几个休眠反应堆比从头开始建造反应堆要容易得多。【原文：

It’s easier to restart a few dormant reactors than build ones from scratch.

】

item.title: 英国央行建议改革金边债券市场以控制杠杆风险
item.description: 英格兰银行公布了旨在提高英国债券市场在压力时期的弹性的建议，官员们希望避免 2022 年的金边债券危机重演。【原文：The Bank of England unveiled proposals designed to improve the resilience of the UK bond market during periods of stress as officials look to avoid a repeat of the 2022 gilt crisis.】

item.title: 美国招聘意向回落而裁员公告增加
item.description: 职业介绍公司 Challenger, Gray & Christmas 的数据显示，在经济不确定性加大的情况下，招聘计划降至有记录以来最弱的 8 月份水平，打算裁员的人数也在增加。【原文：Hiring plans fell to the weakest level for any August on record and intended job cuts mounted amid broader economic uncertainty, according to outplacement firm Challenger, Gray & Christmas.】

item.title: 扎克伯格重返华盛顿，试图影响特朗普政策
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，莱利-格里芬（Riley Griffin）将介绍马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）为影响美国首都决策者所做的个人努力。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Riley Griffin looks at Mark Zuckerberg’s personal effort to influence policymakers in the nation’s capital.】

item.title: 世卫组织就刚果民主共和国疑似出血热疫情发表讲话
item.description: 世界卫生组织非洲办事处将于本周四举行简报会，介绍刚果民主共和国开赛省爆发疑似病毒性出血热疫情的最新情况。【原文：The World Health Organization in Africa will hold a briefing on Thursday to give an update on the outbreak of a suspected viral hemorrhagic fever in Kasai Province in the Democratic Republic of Congo.】

item.title: 美国清洁能源规定限制电池选择，韩国成为生命线
item.description: 针对美国清洁能源税收抵免的严格供应链新规定，缩小了能源项目开发商采购电池的选择范围。【原文：Strict new supply-chain rules for US clean-energy tax credits are narrowing options for energy project developers shopping for batteries.】

item.title: 美国消费者的牛市和熊市情景
item.description: 我是恩达-柯兰（Enda Curran），驻华盛顿的经济记者。今天我们关注美国消费者。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Enda Curran, an economics reporter in Washington. Today we’re looking at the US consumer. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 价值 3 万美元的三星电视暗示了公司产品线的发展方向
item.description: 一台价值 3 万美元的电视机可以为三星电子公司的产品线提供下一步走向的线索。【原文：A $30,000 television could provide clues as to where Samsung Electronics Co.’s lineup is headed next.】

item.title: 英伟达风险投资公司投资霍尼韦尔 Quantinuum 公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的风险投资部门将首次投资 Quantinuum 公司，对霍尼韦尔国际公司（Honeywell International Inc.【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s venture capital arm is investing in Quantinuum for the first time, valuing the quantum computing company controlled by Honeywell International Inc. at $10 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛将在私人基金交易中购买10亿美元的T.Rowe股票
item.description: 高盛集团将向 T. Rowe Price Group Inc. 投资多达 10 亿美元，并与该资产管理公司联手向散户投资者销售私人市场产品。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. will invest as much as $1 billion in T. Rowe Price Group Inc. and team up with the asset manager to sell private-market products to retail investors.】

item.title: 减税点燃印度汽车制造商节日销售激增的希望
item.description: 印度宣布了近十年来最大幅度的减税措施，以刺激内需，同时印度经济也在为美国的惩罚性关税做准备，因此汽车和越野车的销售有望重拾升势。【原文：Sales of cars and SUVs are expected to pick up momentum after India announced the steepest tax cuts in nearly a decade to boost domestic demand as the economy braces for punishing US tariffs.】

item.title: 为什么人们对中国股市飙升感到担忧？
item.description: 当中国股市的悄然回升发展成一场举世震惊的涨势时，令许多经验丰富的市场观察者大吃一惊。【原文：When a quiet resurgence in Chinese equities developed into a world-beating rally, it took many seasoned market watchers by surprise.】

item.title: 特朗普取消 "拜登时代 "对华豁免令芯片制造商震惊
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府刚刚撕毁了一项悄无声息的妥协方案，而世界上一些最大的芯片制造商正是依靠这一方案才得以维持在中国的关键业务。这为四个月的复杂政策谈判埋下了伏笔，既要满足美国的国家安全关切，又要避免对支撑全球电子市场的供应链造成破坏。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration just tore up a quiet compromise that some of the world’s biggest chipmakers have relied on to maintain crucial operations in China. That tees up four months of complex policy talks to satisfy US national security concerns while avoiding disruptions to supply chains that underpin the global electronics market.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯将 2024 年投资流入量调整至接近历史最高水平
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯大幅上调了 2024 年的外国直接投资额，新数据显示其吸引的海外投资者投资额接近历史最高水平。【原文：Saudi Arabia sharply revised up its 2024 foreign direct investment, with new data showing it attracted a near-record sum from overseas investors.】

item.title: 印度减税让许多人买得起人寿和健康保险
item.description: 期待已久的医疗保险和人寿保险免税政策可能会使这些产品的价格便宜近五分之一，从而刺激数百万没有保险的印度人的需求。【原文：A long-awaited tax exemption for health and life insurance could make the products cheaper by almost a fifth, boosting demand among millions of Indians without a cover.】

item.title: 特朗普对美联储独立性的威胁开始令投资者担忧
item.description:
价值股和收益率曲线显示投资者对宽松货币政策的定价。【原文：

Value stocks, yield curve show investors pricing in easier monetary policy.

】

item.title: SK 海力士将支付 27 亿美元奖金以缓和劳资紧张关系
item.description: SK 海力士公司的工会批准了一项具有里程碑意义的协议，仅在 2025 年，平均每位员工就可获得约 8 万美元的奖金，从而避免了罢工，并有可能为韩国科技行业开创先例。【原文：SK Hynix Inc.’s labor union approved a landmark agreement that could see each employee on average receiving about $80,000 bonus for 2025 alone, averting a strike and potentially setting a precedent for South Korea’s tech industry.】
